description: This source file contains implementations for managing device models, including creating and managing devices, endpoints, resources, and metadata within a device management system. It provides functions for creating these entities, linking them together, and handling their attributes and metadata.

classes.name: icDevice
classes.description: Represents a device with associated resources, endpoints, and metadata.

classes.name: icDeviceMetadata
classes.description: Holds metadata information for a device or endpoint.

classes.name: icDeviceEndpoint
classes.description: Represents a specific endpoint of a device, with its own resources and metadata.

classes.name: icDeviceResource
classes.description: Represents a resource of a device or endpoint, including its value, type, and mode.

methods.name: icDevice * createDevice(const char * uuid,const char * deviceClass,uint8_t deviceClassVersion,const char * deviceDriverName,const DeviceDescriptor * dd)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new device object with given parameters and optional metadata from a device descriptor.

methods.name: icDeviceMetadata * createDeviceMetadata(icDevice * device,const char * metadataId,const char * value)
methods.description: Creates a metadata entry for a device with specified metadata ID and value.

methods.name: icDeviceEndpoint * createEndpoint(icDevice * device,const char * id,const char * profile,bool enabled)
methods.description: Creates a new endpoint for a device with specified ID, profile, and enabled state.

methods.name: icDeviceResource * createDeviceResource(icDevice * device,const char * resourceId,const char * value,const char * type,uint8_t mode,ResourceCachingPolicy cachingPolicy)
methods.description: Creates a resource for a device with specified parameters.

methods.name: icDeviceResource * createDeviceResourceIfAvailable(icDevice * device,const char * resourceId,icInitialResourceValues * initialResourceValues,const char * type,uint8_t mode,ResourceCachingPolicy cachingPolicy)
methods.description: Creates a device resource only if initial resource values contain a value for it.

methods.name: icDeviceResource * createEndpointResource(icDeviceEndpoint * endpoint,const char * resourceId,const char * value,const char * type,uint8_t mode,ResourceCachingPolicy cachingPolicy)
methods.description: Creates a resource for a specific device endpoint with specified parameters.

methods.name: icDeviceResource * createEndpointResourceIfAvailable(icDeviceEndpoint * endpoint,const char * resourceId,icInitialResourceValues * initialResourceValues,const char * type,uint8_t mode,ResourceCachingPolicy cachingPolicy)
methods.description: Creates an endpoint resource only if initial resource values contain a value for it.

methods.name: icDeviceMetadata * createDeviceMetadataOnList(icLinkedList * metadataList,const char * endpointId,const char * metadataId,const char * deviceUuid,const char * value)

icDeviceResource * createDeviceResourceOnList(icLinkedList * resourceList,const char * endpointId,const char * resourceId,const char * deviceUuid,const char * value,const char * type,uint8_t mode,ResourceCachingPolicy cachingPolicy)
icDeviceMetadata * createEndpointMetadata(icDeviceEndpoint * endpoint,const char * metadataId,const char * value)
